actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-294.

official_title: Resolution waiving certain points of order against H.R. 8760.  A bill making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974.

summary.text: Provides that during the consideration of the bill (H.R. 8760) making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, and for other purposes, the provisions of clause 2, rule XXI, are hereby waived with respect to any appropriations contained in such bill.

titles.title: Resolution waiving certain points of order against H.R. 8760.  A bill making appropriations for the Department of Transportation and related agencies for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974.
